name: Safety First (EmiliaBornschlegl)
description:
Safety First is a simple 2D autorunner game. Goal of the game is to reach the hospital without getting infected by a virus. The pacing of the game will increase over time so be careful to coordinate jumping and avoiding enemies. Don't forget to collect important items, which may help you against the virus.

Credits:

  • Emilia Bornschlegl
  • Dominik Senzenberger
